text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed ʙa Alloh va rasuli U va ʙa sariati U amal kardaed, xudro ʙa amal kardan dar to'ati Alloh va dur sudan az nofarmonii U nigoh dored. Agar cande mardum sumoro qaʙul nakunand amal kardanro davom dihed, hidojat joftaed. Va cun rohi rostro lozim girifted va amri ʙa ma'ruf va nahji az munkar karded, hec goh onon, ki gumroh mondaand, ʙa sumo zijone narasonand. Bozgasti hamai sumo nazdi Alloh ast, to sumoro ʙa on korho, ki mekardaed, ogoh gardonad
